title: Book of Mormon Wear
summary: Book of Mormon for Android Wear Smart Watches
description: Now you can read the Book of Mormon on your watch. If you have Android Wear, you can read the Book of Mormon from the LDS scriptures.
descriptionHTML: Now you can read the Book of Mormon on your watch. If you have Android Wear, you can read the Book of Mormon from the LDS scriptures.
comments: Perfect and simple app. Wish there was something like this for any book.  Although this really is the only book anyone needs to read! üòÅ
Very handy way to have and read the Book of Mormon anytime. Simple, clean, easy to use interface. The best Wear app ever!
recentChanges: Swipe left to go back to chapter or book view.
